attributes.action: Make David Bowie "Heroes" new national anthem.
attributes.additional_details:
It's uplifting, well-known and would be a great start to any sporting event. And, in a time of great sadness, it would be a great way for us to remember the man who changed pop.

The lyrics and the melody are beautiful and can be sung by young and old.

Because, after all, we can be heroes just for one day.
attributes.background: "Heroes" is an upbeat song, which shows our spirit in sport and in life.

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
